title: ranked has reset? P.S rito please tell us?
body: just finished a game and it said 1/10 placement games ???? is this a mistake or not? just no warning or anything

replies.body:
Hey folks

Just confirming what you noticed.  We had an issue during the season 7 prep process, which meant we had to briefly take down Ranked.  Ranked games will still be counting towards the preseason until Season 7 goes live in 6.24.

Cheers!
Mindstar

Hey Mindstar, I didn't get any points for the last game that glitched to a placements match? 

Does this mean we lose points for the game we played or will it be fixed?

Thanks in advance :)

Hey Dalpz

The issue that we had was causing preseason games to not count towards preseason progress, so that was why we took Ranked down.  You'll be able to see the game in match history but unfortunately it won't count to preseason progress.  

The good news is that it has been fixed now though so you should be good to go!

Mindstar

> [{quoted}](name=DalpZz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U1TU3n5X,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-12-06T09:50:46.634+0000)
>
> Hey Mindstar, I didn't get any points for the last game that glitched to a placements match? 
> 
> Does this mean we lose points for the game we played or will it be fixed?
> 
> Thanks in advance :)

It doesn't matter, ranked will reset again tomorrow.

Yeah i played 2 games thinking it was placements and won both, in the same boat just wondering if we are going to receive any points or will it just roll back. I don't mind its just a little annoyance.
Hey Guys, If you get silver/gold on preseason do you still get the borders and the rewards?
yea same thing happend to me, finished my game and says i completed 1/10 placements.
Riot has a bad habit of accidentally pressing buttons, the one they pressed today was labeled "Ranked Reset (Please use only once 6.24 is started)"
Rank resets tomorrow or the next day as they are starting the reset on the 7th. This might be a bug in the system but yeah it resets tomorrow

yeah had the same thing happen, thought it wasn't coming out till the update though so hopefully this stays around and they don't reset it again cause i just won my first game and i doubt ill win anymore XD
It resets tonight, The ranked timer can found [Here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-2017) as you can see the season starts in less then 24 hours
